how to add add ticket to add ad credits

To add ad credits to your NewsBreak account, you can follow these steps:
1. Log in to your NewsBreak account.
2. Go to the Billing section.
3. Select the option to add ad credits.
4. Follow the prompts to complete the transaction.
For more detailed instructions, you can refer to our Billing Guide here: [Billing Guide](https://help.newsbreak.com/hc/en-us/articles/17821681919757-Billing-Guide).
hey, i set my campaig, ad set and ad "on" but the ad status still remains as "inactive" why is this?

Hey! Let's figure out why your ad status is still inactive. Could you provide me with the following details? 
- Campaign start date 
- Bidding type 
- Targeting or budget settings 
- Any recent changes in the last 72 hours. This will help me understand the issue better and provide you with a solution.

Thanks for the information! Since your campaign start date is today, please check the launch time at the ad set level. News Break Ad Manager operates in PST/military time, so sometimes campaigns are set to start at a later time than expected. If everything looks correct and your ad is still inactive, please let me know any other details like bidding type, targeting or budget settings, and any recent changes in the last 72 hours.
as status is pending what does it mean exactly

When your ad status is 'pending,' it means that your ad is currently under review. This review process ensures that your ad complies with News Break's advertising policies and guidelines. The review typically takes a few hours, but it can sometimes take longer. If your account is new and not yet verified, this could also cause delays. If you need further assistance or if the status doesn't change after a reasonable time, please email adsupport@newsbreak.com with the subject line: Business Verification and include the following details:
- Company's full address
- Company's legal entity name
- Company's EHID or DUNS number
- Primary contact person's name
- Company's phone number
Once we receive this information, we will conduct a thorough review and update you on your account status.
